001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.spi;
002
003import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
004import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
005
006public interface SecretsProvider {
007
008    default String getSecretString(String name)
009            throws UncheckedIOException, IllegalArgumentException
010    {
011        return new String(getSecretBytes(name), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
012    }
013
014    default byte[] getSecretBytes(String name)
015            throws UncheckedIOException, IllegalArgumentException
016    {
017        return getSecretString(name).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
018    }
019
020    default void refreshSecret(String name)
021            throws UncheckedIOException, IllegalArgumentException
022    {
023    }
024}
